sourcesContent:
<template>

<button type="button" @click="onButtonClick" :class="{activeButton: clicked}">
{{text}}
</button>

</template>


<script>
export default{
    name: 'ControlButton',
    props: ['text'], 
    methods: {
        onButtonClick() {
            if (this.clicked == true){
                this.clicked = false
            } else {
                this.clicked = true
            }


        }
    },
    data() {
        return {
            clicked: false
        }
    }

}
</script>

<style scoped> 

button {
    display: block;
    outline: none;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 5px 15px;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    background-color: #f5f7f8;
    border-radius: 2px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #f5f7f8;
}

button:hover {
    animation: forwards 0.2s hoverAnim;
}

.activeButton {
    animation: forwards 0.1s setActive;

}

@keyframes setActive {
    0% {
        border: 0px solid  	#809a38;
    }
    100% {
        border: 2px solid  	#809a38;
    }
}

@keyframes hoverAnim {
    0% {
        background-color: #f5f7f8;
        border-bottom: 0px solid  	#7b9041;
    }
    100% {
        background-color: #cacaca;
        border-bottom: 2px solid  	#7b9041;
    }
}


</style>
